Company Overview.Name: My Mudra Fincorp Ltd
Company Overview.Business Description: Incorporated in 2013, My Mudra Fincorp Limited acts as a Channel Partner (DSA) for major banks and NBFCs in India. The company distributes and sells a wide range of financial products, including secured loans (home and property loans), unsecured loans (business, personal, and professional loans), and credit cards as a channel partner to Banks & NBFCs.

Other Insights.Cons: Though the company is reporting repeated profits, it is not paying out dividend. Debtor days have increased from 53.7 to 65.4 days.
